summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9686 lux) and cloud levels (up 334 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15089 lux), cloud levels (up 1913 m), feels like temperature (up 1.6°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and calm and still conditions are expected. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dark. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
